summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating the designation and use of carpool parking spaces; amending Sections 21.06.130, 21.06.140, 21.36.060, and 21.36.080 of the Traffic Code (Ordinance 91910) and adding thereto new sections designated Sections 21.28.570, 21.28.580, 21.28.590 and 21.28.600.
